markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Primal Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=4751) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 134 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your connection to nature is particularly strong, and the spirits of nature flock around you, helping you replenish your focus. Whenever you Refocus, completely refill your focus pool.
name: Primal Focus
